doctor.name: Dr. Md. Badruzzaman
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Badruzzaman is a Cardiac Surgeon in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, (DU), MS (CVTS). He is working as a Cardiovascular & Thoracic Surgeon doctor in Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Badruzzaman at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.
